title: Roland TR-8 Rhythm Performer
description:
Tr-808 & 909 reproduced in one machine
Analog Modeling Circuit
16 Kits made up of 11 instruments or build your own kit
Built-in side chain function
2 Assignable Outputs & Parallel Outputs via USB
4 Styles of rolls
16 Backlit pads
A/B Pattern Arrangement
Tempo & Shuffle Controls
Random Pattern Generation
10 Style Scatter Function
